data.title: ESPN.com: 1999 NBA Draft: Andrei Kirilenko
data.text:
Andrei Kirilenko

Drafted by:

Utah, Round 1, pick 24.

College: CSKA (Russia) Height: 6-9

Weight: 205 pounds

Position: Forward

Age: 18 (Feb. 18, 1981)

Career highlights

Won CSKA Russian League championship in 1998-99. Team went 23-1 during the season. He scored 12 points in the All-Star game and won the slam-dunk competition. At only age 18, Kirilenko has shown immense potential.
